CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 7, 1957, page A1, reads: "Centenarian - With great respect, five generations of relatives honored Mrs. Mattie (aunt Matt) Vaughan last Wednesday for reaching her 100th birthday. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mattie Vaughan holding card reading "In Life's Golden Years", seated on tree patterned chair
